sub_title: Mechatronics Designer at Canon Production Printing | MSc Systems and Control
summary: Highly-motivated graduate engineer with MSc in Systems and Control. Academic knowledge and experience in manufacturing processes, mechatronic design, dynamical modelling, and control system design. Analytical thinker, willing to take initiative and work effectively both independently and in a team.
